items.value: Business men also have dirty Jobs!
Sometimes business men also have to get dirty!

oh there you are again!
I forgot to mention that you should keep the Business Key,
you will need it again! Take care of him ...

But now we have to do a dirty Job.
I have an order for a Capone, he needs Bongs.
We don't normally do business with this, but we make an exception.

Can you take over this delivery for me?
how can i find this Capone?
i have 1x free Inv. Slot and will do it!

Capone is a known Criminal.
He is the Dealer Boss of the Facists.

Supposedly you can find him in the Underground with the Rats.
They have a hiding Place where you will find him!

It may be that you first have to make friends with the Facists to get Capone! It is a very special order. But you will also be properly paid for it!
Err.. thats to risky for me!

You are my Hero!
I knew you would take care of it.

Deliver these Bongs to Capone.
He will give you a Suitcase that you will bring back to me!
I think Capone will also reward you.

You get:
5x Bong
i got it, will be back!
